original_text: “For thus says the Lord God: I will deal with you as you have done, you who have despised the oath in breaking the covenant,
korean_text: 나 주 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 네가 맹세를 멸시하여 언약을 배반하였은즉 내가 네 행한 대로 네게 행하리라

sentences.original_text: For thus says the Lord God
I will deal with you as you have done
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 행한 대로 너를 대하리니

sentences.original_text: you who have despised the oath
